channel.title: Comments on: Bright Colors in the West

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2013/12/bright-colors-in-the-west/#comment-75517">wang</a>.
Thanks buddy. I'm not a fan of tinting in general, so tinting the back window is very low on my priority list. The car actually came with purpling tint when I first bought it and I had everything immediately removed.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to wang.

Thanks buddy. I’m not a fan of tinting in general, so tinting the back window is very low on my priority list. The car actually came with purpling tint when I first bought it and I had everything immediately removed.

item.title: By: wang
item.dc:creator: wang
item.description: eric, this thing is looking gooooooooooooood! question: do you hate the idea of tinting the back window?
item.content:encoded: eric, this thing is looking gooooooooooooood! question: do you hate the idea of tinting the back window?

item.title: By: Pogi
item.dc:creator: Pogi
item.description: I already miss the front bumper

item.description:

Your blog needs a “like” button lol! great work man.

item.title: By: 4g63rotary
item.dc:creator: 4g63rotary
item.description: I don't see any 7Tuned stickers on that amazing car my dear sir!
item.content:encoded: I don’t see any 7Tuned stickers on that amazing car my dear sir!
